Tunable.name: CAREER_TRACK_RETIRED
Tunable.description: A carer track for retired Sims. This is used for 'Ask about Career' notifications.

Tunable.name: DAILY_HOURS_WORKED_FALLBACK
Tunable.description: If a Sim retires from a career that has no fixed schedule, use this number to compute average hours worked per day.

TunableTuple.name: DAILY_PAY_MULTIPLIER
TunableTuple.description: Multiplier on the average daily pay of the retired career the Sim will get every day.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableTuple.name: DAILY_PAY_NOTIFICATION
TunableTuple.description: Message when a Sim receives a retirement payout.

TunableVariant.name: additional_texts
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, add additional text to the dialog

Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: anonymous_target_sim
Tunable.description: DEPRECATED! Please use custom_mask_target_sim instead. Use InGame/UI/Icons/Dialog/phone_anonymous_caller_icon.png and UI/Gameplay/Phone:UnknownCallerName. If this dialog is using a target sim id to give a conversation type view and this is checked, then the target sim icon will instead be replaced by an anonymous caller.

TunableVariant.name: audio_sting
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, play an audio sting when the dialog is shown.

Tunable.name: audio
Tunable.description: The sound to play.

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description: If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.

TunableVariant.name: audio_sting_owner
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this will set the owner of the audio sting when the dialog is shown.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant of the interaction who will play the audio_sting.

TunableEnum.name: auto_delete_reason
TunableEnum.description: Specify the notification's auto-delete reason.

TunableVariant.name: background_audio
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, play background audio while the dialog is open.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The background audio event string.

TunableVariant.name: background_image
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, add a background image to the dialog. This will only be used in the case where dialog_bg_style is BG_DYNAMIC_IMAGE.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The background image for the family portrait.

TunableVariant.name: custom_mask_target_sim
TunableVariant.description: When tuned, display the given icon/name for the target Sim instead of the Sim's actual icon/name.

Tunable.name: career_reference
Tunable.description: The Career to override the icon.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the career.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the lifestyle brand we want to use.

TunableTuple.name: participant
TunableTuple.description: The Sim who's thumbnail will be used.

TunableTuple.name: privacy
TunableTuple.description: Search an interaction's privacy liability to find violating Sims and randomly select one to display an icon of.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who's ranked statistic we want to get.

Tunable.name: ranked_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic to find the icon of.

TunableTuple.name: resource_key
TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant is secret for which we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: The Participant who owns the small business we want to get the icon from.

TunableList.name: participant_type
TunableList.description: We use this participant's holiday tracker to get the icon.

TunableVariant.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: career_reference
Tunable.description: The Career to override the icon.

TunableTuple.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: participant_type

TunableEnum.name: dialog_bg_style
TunableEnum.description: The style background to apply to this dialog.

TunableEnum.name: dialog_footer_type
TunableEnum.description: An enumeration of the type for YES BUTTONS and DIALOG BUTTON footers. AUTOMATIC lets the code decide which footer to use. YES_BUTTONS_FOOTER is a footer with an OK BUTTON by default. DIALOG_BUTTONS_FOOTER is a footer with only DIALOG BUTTONS.

TunableList.name: dialog_options
TunableList.description: Options to apply to the dialog.

TunableEnum.name: dialog_style
TunableEnum.description: The style layout to apply to this dialog.

TunableEnum.name: expand_behavior
TunableEnum.description: Specify the notification's expand behavior.

TunableVariant.name: icon_override_participant
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows a different participant to be considered the owner of this dialog. Typically, this will only affect the Sim portrait used at the top of the dialog, but there could be other adverse affects so be sure to talk to your UI partner before tuning this.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The participant to be used as the owner of this dialog. If this participant doesn't exist, the default owner will be used instead.

TunableEnum.name: information_level
TunableEnum.description: Specify the notification's information level.

TunableList.name: override_text_mapping
TunableList.description: If enabled, we will override the TNS text depending on age

Tunable.name: override_string
Tunable.description: The alternate text that will be displayed in the TNS.

TunableVariant.name: participant
TunableVariant.description: This field is deprecated. Please use 'icon' instead.

TunableEnum.name: phone_ring_type
TunableEnum.description: The phone ring type of this dialog. If tuned to anything other than None this dialog will only appear after clicking on the phone.

TunableVariant.name: primary_icon_response
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, associate a response to clicking the primary icon.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The response associated to the primary icon.

TunableVariant.name: audio_event_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the audio event sent by this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The button audio event name.

TunableVariant.name: build_buy_filters
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specified category and pack id will be applied in the build buy mode

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Category tag and Pack ID to filter in build buy mode

TunableEnum.name: category_tag
TunableEnum.description: Category tag to filter in build buy mode Filters include all the buy categories

TunableEnum.name: pack_id
TunableEnum.description: Pack Id to be filtered in build buy mode

TunableVariant.name: button_icon
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the icon to be shown on this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: loots_for_response
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify loots to apply and dialog response id for this response.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Loots to apply for the response and dialog response id that will override the original id.

TunableEnum.name: dialog_response_id_override
TunableEnum.description: The dialog response id for this response that will override the default response id. Make sure this is unique for each response.

TunableList.name: loots
TunableList.description: A list of loots that will be applied when the player selects this response.

TunableVariant.name: response_command
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specifies a command to be called by the client.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a UIResponseCommand tuning snippet.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A UI Response that sends a server command.

TunableList.name: arguments
TunableList.description: The arguments for this command. Arguments will be added after the command.

TunableVariant.description: An argument being passed to the command.

TunableTuple.name: boolean
TunableTuple.description: A boolean value.

TunableTuple.name: floating_point
TunableTuple.description: A floating point number.

TunableTuple.name: integer
TunableTuple.description: An integer number.

TunableTuple.name: participant_id
TunableTuple.description: UI Response argument that will resolve the participant specified.

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant to resolve for this response argument. The value sent will be the id of the specified participant. If more than one participant is found, it will only send the id of the first participant found.

TunableTuple.name: special_command_data
TunableTuple.description: This will use the data passed into the show_dialog() function. This must be supported with GPE work, so only use this if you have talked to a GPE.

TunableTuple.name: string
TunableTuple.description: A string.

Tunable.name: command
Tunable.description: The command.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a UIResponseCommand tuning snippet.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip_text
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the tooltip text to be shown on hover for this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The tooltip's text.

TunableVariant.name: tutorial_id
TunableVariant.description: If set, this tutorial ID will be used for SHOW_LESSONS requests.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: ID of a Tutorial, TutorialCategory, or TutorialSubcategory to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_name
TunableVariant.description: If set, this UI message will be used for SEND_UI_MESSAGE requests.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Name of a UI message to be sent.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_tuned_args
TunableVariant.description: (Requires Ui Message Name to be tuned.) If set, these message arguments will be used in SEND_UI_MESSAGE requests.

TunableTuple.description: Arguments for the UI message.

Tunable.description: The name of this argument.

TunableVariant.name: argument_value
TunableVariant.description: The value of this argument.

TunableEnum.description: This prompt's associated UI action.

TunableEnum.description: Pack Id to be filtered in build buy mode

TunableVariant.name: button_icon
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the icon to be shown on this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: loots_for_response
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specify loots to apply and dialog response id for this response.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Loots to apply for the response and dialog response id that will override the original id.

TunableEnum.name: dialog_response_id_override
TunableEnum.description: The dialog response id for this response that will override the default response id. Make sure this is unique for each response.

TunableList.name: loots
TunableList.description: A list of loots that will be applied when the player selects this response.

TunableVariant.name: response_command
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specifies a command to be called by the client.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a UIResponseCommand tuning snippet.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A UI Response that sends a server command.

TunableList.name: arguments
TunableList.description: The arguments for this command. Arguments will be added after the command.

TunableVariant.description: An argument being passed to the command.

TunableTuple.name: boolean
TunableTuple.description: A boolean value.

TunableTuple.name: floating_point
TunableTuple.description: A floating point number.

TunableTuple.name: integer
TunableTuple.description: An integer number.

TunableTuple.name: participant_id
TunableTuple.description: UI Response argument that will resolve the participant specified.

TunableEnum.name: participant
TunableEnum.description: The participant to resolve for this response argument. The value sent will be the id of the specified participant. If more than one participant is found, it will only send the id of the first participant found.

TunableTuple.name: special_command_data
TunableTuple.description: This will use the data passed into the show_dialog() function. This must be supported with GPE work, so only use this if you have talked to a GPE.

TunableTuple.name: string
TunableTuple.description: A string.

Tunable.name: command
Tunable.description: The command.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a UIResponseCommand tuning snippet.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip_text
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the tooltip text to be shown on hover for this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The tooltip's text.

TunableVariant.name: tutorial_id
TunableVariant.description: If set, this tutorial ID will be used for SHOW_LESSONS requests.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: ID of a Tutorial, TutorialCategory, or TutorialSubcategory to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_name
TunableVariant.description: If set, this UI message will be used for SEND_UI_MESSAGE requests.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: Name of a UI message to be sent.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_tuned_args
TunableVariant.description: (Requires Ui Message Name to be tuned.) If set, these message arguments will be used in SEND_UI_MESSAGE requests.

TunableTuple.description: Arguments for the UI message.

Tunable.name: argument_name
Tunable.description: The name of this argument.

TunableVariant.name: argument_value
TunableVariant.description: The value of this argument.

TunableEnum.name: ui_request
TunableEnum.description: This prompt's associated UI action.

TunableVariant.name: secondary_icon_response
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, associate a response to clicking the secondary icon.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The response associated to the secondary icon.

TunableVariant.name: audio_event_name
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this is the audio event sent by this button.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The button audio event name.

TunableVariant.name: build_buy_filters
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, specified category and pack id will be applied in the build buy mode

TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this dialog will include subtitle text.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The dialog's subtitle.

TunableVariant.name: text
TunableVariant.description: The dialog's text.

TunableTuple.name: concatenation
TunableTuple.description: A list of localized string concatenations. These strings will be joined together into single line-separated string

TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a LocalizedString tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: literal
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a LocalizedString tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: single
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TunableTuple.name: variation
TunableTuple.description: A list of possible localized string variations.

Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TunableVariant.name: timeout_duration
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, override the timeout duration for this dialog in game time.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The time, in sim minutes, that this dialog should time out.

TunableVariant.name: title
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this dialog will include title text.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The dialog's title.

TunableVariant.name: tns_suppression_group
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the TNS will be considered for suppression. Suppression occurs if the number of notifications in this group that fire exceed the tuned TNS suppression limit.

TunableList.name: ui_responses
TunableList.description: A list of buttons that are mapped to UI commands.

TunableTuple.description: A dialog response.

TunableList.TunableTuple: <TunableVariant type="None" name="subtext" class="TunableLocalizedStringFactoryVariant" default="single" display="Subtext" description="If tuned, this text will display below the button. Span tags can be used to change the color of the text to green/positive and red/negative. TEXT will make the word TEXT green TEXT will make the word TEXT red" group="General">

TunableEnum.name: urgency
TunableEnum.description: Specify the notification's urgency.

TunableEnum.name: visual_type
TunableEnum.description: Specify the notification's visual treatment.
